column4: what is the very first thing one would do upon a fresh install to guard against mal...anything?  im tired of googling.  i want to ASK someone.

first thing is in a terminal.. sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get upgrade && sudo apt-get dist-upgrade ... as far as protecting your machine.. not much.. windows viri and whatnot just doesn't work in linux
and Snausages, if i could past to you what i have discussed elswhere, you would see how i have a reason to believe it could not be that simple
it's a steep learning curve in the beginning but then you level out until you discover some new project to tackel .. like a web server, ftp.. streaming a/v server etc.
